articles.title: BlackRock pulling $2 trillion of assets out of State Street - Fox Business
articles.description: BlackRock Inc. BLK -0.10% is pulling some $2 trillion of assets out of State Street Corp.’s STT -2.29% safekeeping, a move that will reduce the investing firm’s reliance on a small number of parties and lower the fees it pays for back-office work.
